forms.title: Personal Finance Application
forms._form:
[section_break section_break-695 "Finance Application"] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [section_break section_break-1 "Applicant Name:"] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [address present-address format:international required_fields:line1|city|state|zip|country] [address previous-address format:international required_fields:line1|city|state|zip|country] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:3] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [section_break section_break-266 "Co-Applicant Information"] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [address co-address format:international required_fields:line1|city|state|zip|country] [checkbox checkbox-217 "By clicking the submit button, I agree to terms & conditions"]

I authorize the XXX to make whatever inquires it deems necessary in connection with this credit application and in the course of review or collection of any credit extended in reliance on this application. I further authorized any person or YYY to complete and finish to the XXX any information that it may have or obtain in response to such inquires and agree that such information along with this application shall remain the XXX's property, whether or not credit is extended. All information stated in this application is declared to be a true representation of the facts and made for the purpose of obtaining the credit request. I HAVE REVIEWED THE ABOVE DISCLOSURE.

[submit "Submit"]

_mail.subject: [_site_title] "[your-subject]"
_mail.body:
From: [your-name] [your-email]
Subject: [your-subject]

Message Body:
[your-message]

-- 
This is a notification that a contact form was submitted on your website ([_site_title] [_site_url]).

_mail_2.subject: [_site_title] "[your-subject]"
_mail_2.body:
Message Body:
[your-message]

-- 
This email is a receipt for your contact form submission on our website ([_site_title] [_site_url]) in which your email address was used. If that was not you, please ignore this message.

_messages.mail_sent_ok: Thank you for your message. It has been sent.
_messages.mail_sent_ng: There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later.
_messages.validation_error: One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again.
_messages.spam: There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later.
_messages.accept_terms: You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message.
_messages.invalid_too_long: This field has a too long input.
_messages.invalid_too_short: This field has a too short input.
_messages.upload_failed: There was an unknown error uploading the file.
_messages.upload_file_type_invalid: You are not allowed to upload files of this type.
_messages.upload_file_too_large: The uploaded file is too large.
_messages.upload_failed_php_error: There was an error uploading the file.
_messages.invalid_date: Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
_messages.date_too_early: This field has a too early date.
_messages.date_too_late: This field has a too late date.
_messages.number_too_small: This field has a too small number.
_messages.number_too_large: This field has a too large number.
_messages.quiz_answer_not_correct: The answer to the quiz is incorrect.
_messages.invalid_captcha: Could not verify the reCaptcha response.
